InstalledItem.Name: Prevenir
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Military

The Prevenir has been refined by extensive military field testing, making it the go-to vehicle radar for many across the UEE.

InstalledItem.Name: Radix
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd.
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

With more than enough get up and go to handle your vehicle’s daily energy needs, the Radix from Lightning Power Ltd. is a power plant you can count on to get you where you’re going.

InstalledItem.Name: Frost-Star SL
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: J-Span
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Whether cruising across the ground or sailing through space, there’s a J-Span cooler perfect for you. The Frost-Star SL is a mid-tier cooler designed to bring the line’s reliability to ground and open-canopy vehicles.

InstalledItem.Name: 9-Series Longsword Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: KnightBridge Arms
Item Type: Ballistic Cannon
Size: 1

The entry level autocannon of the KnightBridge Arms Sword-line, the 9-Series Longsword fires a ballistic round designed for use against a variety of armored hostiles while allowing pilots to keep a healthy distance from targets.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-322 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 2xS2

Behring’s MSD-322 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Dominator II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Talon
Tracking Signal: Electromagnetic
Size: 2

Designed to track an opponent’s electromagnetic signature, the Dominator strike missile is a precision ordnance package designed to establish tactical battlefield dominance.

InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator

With the PIN vehicle shield generator you can now trust Seal Corp to protect you whether you’re in space or atmosphere.
